sentence.Network_en: We apologize for any inconvenience caused during the repairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们为维修期间造成的任何不便道歉。

sentence.Network_en: We apologize for the delay and regret any inconvenience it may have caused.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对此次延误以及因此有可能造成的所有不便表示道歉。

sentence.Network_en: I don't want to put you to any inconvenience.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不希望给你带来任何的不便.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally in the sense 'incongruity', inconsistency also in the general sense'unsuitability'): via Old French from late Latin inconvenientia 'incongruity, inconsistency', from in- 'not' + Latin convenient- 'agreeing, fitting' (see convenient)

entry.def: If someone or something causes inconvenience, they cause problems or difficulties.

example.ex: We apologize for any inconvenience caused during the repairs...
example.tran: 我们为维修期间造成的任何不便道歉。

example.ex: The practical inconveniences of long hair are negligible.
example.tran: 长发在实际生活中产生的不便可以忽略不计。

entry.def: If someone inconveniences you, they cause problems or difficulties for you.

example.ex: He promised to be quick so as not to inconvenience them any further.
example.tran: 他许诺尽快完成，以免给他们带来更多不便。

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of not being useful or convenient
1. to cause inconvenience or discomfort to;

auth_sentence.content: Once again I am very sorry for the inconvenience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once again I am very sorry for the inconvenience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once again I am very sorry for the inconvenience.

auth_sentence.content: I mean, what an inconvenience to the fans.
auth_sentence.res_content: I mean, what an inconvenience to the fans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I mean, what an inconvenience to the fans.

auth_sentence.content: She said that she was sorry for any inconvenience.
auth_sentence.res_content: She said that she was sorry for any inconvenience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She said that she was sorry for any inconvenience.

Sentence.sentence: The average amount of time students now take to complete an undergraduate degree has stretched to six years and seven months as students interrupted by work, inconvenienced by unavailable classes, or lured by one more football season find it hard to graduate.

means.word_mean: 不方便, 麻烦, 打扰

sentences.en: I don’t want to put you to any inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 我不希望给你带来任何的不便。

sentences.en: All that he did caused her much inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切他都给她增添了麻烦。

sentences.en: It’s no inconvenience to drive you to the station.
sentences.cn: 开车送你去车站一点也不麻烦。

means.word_mean: 给…带来不便, 给…添麻烦, 打扰

sentences.en: Does the noise of the TV inconvenience you?
sentences.cn: 电视的嘈杂吵声打扰你吗?
